name: Build Bot
description: Build Bot is a Discord chat bot which announces the completion of Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment builds on Azure DevOps (formerly Visual Studio Team Services Online).

name: Reddit Ranked Flairs
description: Reddit Ranked Flairs is a website which automatically handles the administration of "badges" for a community of players in the astonishigly popular online strategy game League of Legends.
Players who visit my website are permitted to sign in using their Reddit accounts. Once their signed in, they can register to own a unique name inside the League of Legends universe.
After registering, users will have their in-game achievements shown for all to see on Reddit.
